bibl.title: State of Nebraska Department of Insurance

body.seg: State of Nebraska DEPARTMENT OF INSURANCE Summary of Insurance Business in Nebraska for the Year 1940 Also Comparative Figures of Authorized Companies for the Years 1937, 1938, 1939

To His Excellency, Governor frwight Griswolfl: We respectfully submit the summary of business of companies auth - orized to write insurance in this State for tfce year ending December 31, 19 4 0. DEPARTMENT OF INSURANCE, >C. C. FRAIZER, Director.

Zones shown are for purpose of Convention Examinations. Light face figures in respective State indicates Nebraska Companies writing in that state. BoM face fißUres in respective State indicates Companies domiciled in that State writing in Nebraska. Where but one figure appears indicates Nebraska Companies writing in that State 27 Nebraska Companies write in other States. Figures in map compiled as of July 11, 1941.
